author: Corinne Abrams
title: India Announces Plan to Crack Down on Cryptocurrency Misuse
text:
NEW DELHI—Indian Finance Minister Arun Jaitley on Thursday signaled the South Asian nation was planning to crack down on the misuse of cryptocurrencies, saying it didn’t recognize the digital money as legal tender.
Mr. Jaitley, addressing Parliament during his annual budget announcement, said the government would “take all measures to eliminate use of these crypto-assets in financing illegitimate activities or as part of the payment system.”
...
